forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sun and clouds mixed. High near 5C. Winds E at 15 to 30 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Sunshine and clouds mixed. High 41F. Winds E at 10 to 20 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few clouds. Low 1C. Winds E at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Some clouds. Low 33F. Winds E at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mainly cloudy. High 4C. Winds E at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: More clouds than sun. High 39F. Winds E at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A mixture of rain and snow showers. Low 1C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of precip 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: A mixture of rain and snow showers. Low 34F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of precip 60%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain and snow showers in the morning. Then remaining overcast in the afternoon. High 4C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of precip 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain and snow showers in the morning. Then remaining overcast in the afternoon. High near 40F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of precip 50%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly cloudy skies early followed by a mixture of light rain and snow overnight. Low around 0C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of precip 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly cloudy skies early followed by a mixture of light rain and snow overnight. Low 32F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of precip 40%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain and snow showers in the morning. The rain and snow will become lighter and change to all rain in the afternoon. High 4C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of precip 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain and snow showers in the morning transitioning to light rain late. High 39F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of precip 70%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A steady rain in the evening. Showers continuing late. Low 2C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 70%. Rainfall around 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers late. Low 36F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 70%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Overcast. High 4C. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy. Temps nearly steady in the upper 30s. Winds ESE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain likely. Low 2C. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall near 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain. Low 36F. Winds ESE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall around a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain likely. High 6C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 80%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with periods of rain. High 42F. Winds SSE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 80%.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Overcast with rain showers at times. Low 2C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Overcast with rain showers at times. Low near 35F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Overcast with rain showers at times. High 6C. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. High 42F. Winds SSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with occasional light rain after midnight. Low 1C. Winds SE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with occasional light rain after midnight. Low 33F. Winds SE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Periods of rain. High near 5C. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%. Rainfall near 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain likely. High 41F. Winds SSE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain. Low 4C. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%. Rainfall near 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Periods of rain. Low near 40F. Winds WSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Periods of rain. High 8C. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%. Rainfall near 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with periods of rain. High 47F. Winds WSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. Low 4C. Winds SW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. Low 38F. Winds SW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers early becoming a steady light rain later in the day. High 7C. Winds SW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers early becoming a steady light rain later in the day. High 44F. Winds SW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.fcttext: Occasional light rain. Low 36F. Winds W at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.
